files.Title: Avalonia.Collections.PageChangingEventArgs

files.Title: Avalonia.Controls.AdvancedRowHeightEstimator
files.Summary:
Advanced implementation of that provides optimized handling for variable row heights. Features include:

  • Height cache for measured rows
  • Regional averages for localized estimation
  • Smooth scroll correction
  • Fenwick tree for efficient cumulative height queries
  • Bidirectional estimation updates

files.Title: Avalonia.Controls.CachingRowHeightEstimator
files.Summary: Advanced implementation of that caches individual row heights for more accurate scrolling with variable height rows.
